17 TEST (NodeTestCoveragePath, testActionServer)
18 {
19  // create action client
20  actionlib::SimpleActionClient<cpswarm_msgs::PathGenerationAction> path_client("coverage_path/generate", true); // new thread
21  ASSERT_TRUE(path_client.waitForServer(Duration(5.0))); // failure, if server does not respond within 5 seconds
22 
23  // call action server
24  cpswarm_msgs::PathGenerationGoal goal;
25  goal.start.x = -10;
26  goal.start.y = -10;
27  path_client.sendGoal(goal);
28  ASSERT_TRUE(path_client.waitForResult(Duration(5.0))); // failure, if result is not ready within 5 seconds
29 
30  // test result
31  vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> path = path_client.getResult()->path.poses;
32  ASSERT_EQ(path.size(), 81);
33  // start point
34  geometry_msgs::Point pos = goal.start;
35  pos.x += 0.25;
36  pos.y += 0.25;
37  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(path[0].pose.position.x, pos.x);
38  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(path[0].pose.position.y, pos.y);
39 
40 }

45 TEST (NodeTestCoveragePath, testService)
46 {
47  NodeHandle nh;
48 
49  // create waypoint service client
50  ServiceClient get_wp_client = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::GetWaypoint>("coverage_path/waypoint");
51  ASSERT_TRUE(get_wp_client.waitForExistence(Duration(5.0)));
52 
53  // test all waypoints
54  cpswarm_msgs::GetWaypoint gwp;
55 
56  // start point
57  gwp.request.position.x = -10;
58  gwp.request.position.y = -10;
59  gwp.request.tolerance = 0.1;
60  ASSERT_TRUE(get_wp_client.call(gwp));
61  ASSERT_TRUE(gwp.response.valid);
62  gwp.request.position.x += 0.25;
63  gwp.request.position.y += 0.25;
64  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.x, gwp.request.position.x);
65  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.y, gwp.request.position.y);
66 
67  // meander to the right
68  for (int i=1; i<77; i+=4) {
69  gwp.request.position.y = 9.75;
70  ASSERT_TRUE(get_wp_client.call(gwp));
71  ASSERT_TRUE(gwp.response.valid);
72  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.x, gwp.request.position.x);
73  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.y, gwp.request.position.y);
74  EXPECT_TRUE(gwp.response.valid);
75  gwp.request.position.x += 0.5;
76  ASSERT_TRUE(get_wp_client.call(gwp));
77  ASSERT_TRUE(gwp.response.valid);
78  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.x, gwp.request.position.x);
79  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.y, gwp.request.position.y);
80  gwp.request.position.y = -9.25;
81  ASSERT_TRUE(get_wp_client.call(gwp));
82  ASSERT_TRUE(gwp.response.valid);
83  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.x, gwp.request.position.x);
84  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.y, gwp.request.position.y);
85  gwp.request.position.x += 0.5;
86  ASSERT_TRUE(get_wp_client.call(gwp));
87  ASSERT_TRUE(gwp.response.valid);
88  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.x, gwp.request.position.x);
89  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.y, gwp.request.position.y);
90  }
91  // return to start
92  gwp.request.position.y = 9.75;
93  ASSERT_TRUE(get_wp_client.call(gwp));
94  ASSERT_TRUE(gwp.response.valid);
95  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.x, gwp.request.position.x);
96  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.y, gwp.request.position.y);
97  gwp.request.position.x += 0.5;
98  ASSERT_TRUE(get_wp_client.call(gwp));
99  ASSERT_TRUE(gwp.response.valid);
100  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.x, gwp.request.position.x);
101  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.y, gwp.request.position.y);
102  gwp.request.position.y = -9.75;
103  ASSERT_TRUE(get_wp_client.call(gwp));
104  ASSERT_TRUE(gwp.response.valid);
105  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.x, gwp.request.position.x);
106  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.y, gwp.request.position.y);
107  gwp.request.position.x = -9.75;
108  ASSERT_TRUE(get_wp_client.call(gwp));
109  ASSERT_TRUE(gwp.response.valid);
110  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.x, gwp.request.position.x);
111  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.y, gwp.request.position.y);
112  ASSERT_TRUE(get_wp_client.call(gwp));
113  ASSERT_FALSE(gwp.response.valid);
114 }

119 TEST (NodeTestCoveragePath, testSwarm)
120 {
121  NodeHandle nh;
122 
123  // create action client
124  actionlib::SimpleActionClient<cpswarm_msgs::PathGenerationAction> path_client("coverage_path/generate", true); // new thread
125  ASSERT_TRUE(path_client.waitForServer(Duration(5.0))); // failure, if server does not respond within 5 seconds
126 
127  // call action server to create new path
128  cpswarm_msgs::PathGenerationGoal goal;
129  goal.start.x = 10;
130  goal.start.y = -10;
131  path_client.sendGoal(goal);
132  ASSERT_TRUE(path_client.waitForResult(Duration(5.0))); // failure, if result is not ready within 5 seconds
133  // test result
134  vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> path = path_client.getResult()->path.poses;
135  ASSERT_EQ(path.size(), 81);
136  // start point
137  geometry_msgs::Point pos = goal.start;
138  pos.x -= 0.25;
139  pos.y += 0.25;
140  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(path[0].pose.position.x, pos.x);
141  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(path[0].pose.position.y, pos.y);
142 
143  // create waypoint service client
144  ServiceClient get_wp_client = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::GetWaypoint>("coverage_path/waypoint");
145  ASSERT_TRUE(get_wp_client.waitForExistence(Duration(5.0)));
146 
147  // swarm member publisher
148  Publisher swarm_publisher = nh.advertise<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfStates>("swarm_state", 1);
149 
150  // test start point
151  cpswarm_msgs::GetWaypoint gwp;
152  gwp.request.position.x = 10;
153  gwp.request.position.y = -10;
154  gwp.request.tolerance = 0.1;
155  ASSERT_TRUE(get_wp_client.call(gwp)); // generates a new path with given start
156  ASSERT_TRUE(gwp.response.valid);
157  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.x, 9.75);
158  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.y, -9.75);
159 
160  // test start point
161  gwp.request.position.x = 5;
162  gwp.request.position.y = 5;
163  gwp.request.tolerance = 0.1;
164  ASSERT_TRUE(get_wp_client.call(gwp)); // uses existing path, same start point
165  ASSERT_TRUE(gwp.response.valid);
166  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.x, 9.75);
167  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.y, -9.75);
168 
169  // change swarm
170  Rate rate(1);
171  for (int i=0; i<10; ++i) {
172  rate.sleep();
173  if(swarm_publisher.getNumSubscribers() > 0)
174  break;
175  }
176  ASSERT_EQ(swarm_publisher.getNumSubscribers(), 1);
177  cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfStates swarm_state_msg;
178  cpswarm_msgs::StateEvent state_event;
179  state_event.header.stamp = Time::now();
180  state_event.swarmio.node = "New CPS";
181  state_event.state = "valid";
182  swarm_state_msg.states.push_back(state_event);
183  swarm_publisher.publish(swarm_state_msg);
184  spinOnce();
185 
186  // test start point
187  gwp.request.position.x = 5;
188  gwp.request.position.y = 5;
189  gwp.request.tolerance = 0.1;
190  ASSERT_TRUE(get_wp_client.call(gwp)); // generate new path, new start point
191  ASSERT_TRUE(gwp.response.valid);
192  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.x, 5.25);
193  EXPECT_FLOAT_EQ(gwp.response.point.y, 5.25);
194 }
